tag_list: a-leader-in-music-composition, recording, mixing, mastering, branding, distribution, publishing, artist-management, software-development-and-finance-
overview:
Trace Thomas is Founder and C.E.O. of Masterlab.com. A Pioneer in Content Mastering for Audio, Video, Internet, Mobile, Medical, Print and Network Systems. Founded by Trace Thomas, Masterlab consults companies including Apple Computer (Professional Products), Avid (Video Workstations), Adobe Systems (CoSA After Effects), Taiyo Yuden (CD-R Manufacturing), Sonic Solutions (Audio Mastering), Sony Records (Artist Content), Rimage Corporation (CD & DVD Duplication and Labeling), Gracenote (File Management) and many more.

Masterlab.com led by Trace and Sara Lee Lucas (co-founder of the music group Marilyn Manson) also employs proprietary Audio and Video mastering, manufacturing and content delivery services for a range of Music and Television Clients including Prince, The Rolling Stones, Nine Inch Nails, Madonna, Enya, Jay-Z, Maroon 5, Collective Soul, The Prodigy, Jewel, Tori Amos, Linkin Park, Disturbed, Smashing Pumpkins, Britney Spears, Backstreet Boys, Outkast, Jermaine Dupri, Pitbull, Warner Music, Sony Records, Universal, EMI, and hundreds more. Trace and Masterlab to date have achieved 176 million R.I.A.A. certified unit sales with over 5,000 clients on five continents.

Providing articulate creative services, technology assessment and management, and engineering expertise to Music, TV, Film, Gaming, Technology and Corporate clients worldwide since 1995.
